document.full_text: nathan horton, the star for boston in game 7 of the conference finals, would have awarded the jacket to the m.v.p. of monday's win, but he was hospitalized with a severe concussion.
document.title: stanley cup finals | bruins 4, canucks 0: the bruins keep their lucky jacket in horton's stall
lines_and_colors: nathan horton, the star for boston in game 7 of the conference finals, would have awarded the jacket to the m.v.p. of monday's win, but he was hospitalized with a severe concussion.
